name: Space Survivor (RaviShankarPosina)
description:
Let's do something dangerous today. Trigger the sensors. Cause the booms. Escape the blast radius. I have a challenge for you. Can you beat me at my game?

Team: Ravagers

Producer - Ravi Shankar Posina

Designers - Surendra Pinninti, Sanjeev Nalla

Artist - Hemanth Surya Vinjamalla

Programmers - Purushotham Sah, Sekhar Gowthu
